ValidationRule.description: Ensures the Customer Issue is populated based on the Initai Contact
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name='New Standard Case', (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed")), ISPICKVAL( Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c ,"Info or Advice or Confirmation") && ISBLANK(Text(Customer_Struggle__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure that you have selected the reason for contact from "Customer Struggle" picklists below
